[Hitbox sizes in the game's code]

  - For adult mobs hitbox sizes, you can find them in net.minecraft.world.entity.EntityType class.
  - For baby mobs hitbox sizes, you typically find them in the individual mob class.

Good luck! ~ Outrowed
